messages.subject: Overheard in a restaraunt
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/10/02 2:50:36 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/10/02 2:50:36 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< While I'm on a roll here, does anyone else go to Trader Joe's? >>

I sure miss that place!! I love the way they ring your purchase up without
laser scanners and calling out the price of each item.....just like all the
stores used to do.
I don't remember grumpy old people shopping there though....but it's been a
while. No Trader Joe's down here in FL :(

Ren
"The answers aren't important really...
What's important, is knowing all the questions."
-Zilpha Keatley Snyder
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
